t: Best Amazon Fire TVs in 2025
s: June 3, 2024 - Did you know that Amazon makes its own TVs? For years, the company’s Fire OS has been in wide use on smart TVs by the likes of Hisense and TCL, as well on Amazon’s own lineup of streaming devices. But since 2022, Amazon has also been releasing first-party QLEDs and regular LED-LCDs.

t: Amazon Adds Support for Watch Party on Fire TV Devices | PCMag
s: July 9, 2021 - Confirmation of this can be found in the FAQ section of the Watch Party web page, which also states you'll need to open the Prime app on your Fire TV device in order for it to work. It's still not possible to join a Watch Party via a mobile device for actually watching a movie or TV show.
